{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Armorer | class = Armorer | game = Strife | doomednum = 73 | convid = 4 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]]→Armorer
An armorer. Mostly inherited from the [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]] class. These guys sell armor, surprisingly. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Armorer : {{Class|Merchant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 5 {{Property|PainSound}} "armorer/pain" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_ARMORER" // "Armorer" }
